mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.receive_user_id AS "receiveUserId", a.title AS "title", a.content AS "content"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO msg_notice_letter ( id, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, del_flag, remarks, receive_user_id, title, content ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks}, #{receiveUserId}, #{title}, #{content} )
mapper.update: UPDATE msg_notice_letter SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateTime}, del_flag = #{delFlag}, remarks = #{remarks}, receive_user_id = #{receiveUserId}, title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE id = #{id}
